reviews.review_msg: Brown is a nice guy and does everything right.. Exams are totally fair as with the assignments.. All these first yr. students absolutely give 2 shiets about math and don't know it all. Ppl make mistakes, so what? And you don't?
Why so negative comments? Maybe you guys are a bunch of first year absentminded students who don't know much about mathematics. Fair Midterms and Finals
